item.title: Product Owner Services Renewable Energy | 12 Years E-Commerce Experience | Netherlands
item.description:
Experienced (12 years) product owner for software systems. I am experienced in software products like webapps, and iPad apps including the necessary back-end services and company system integrations. I have specialized in e-Commerce applications in the renewable energy sector, but I learn domain knowledge quickly. Fluent in English and Dutch, I will actively seek for improved solutions for challenges and opportunities of and with the stake holders.

Core Expertise

  • Applying the scrum agile framework as a product owner with internal and external teams.
  • Aligning and guiding stake holders to find solutions for opportunities and challenges.
  • Creating product functional visuals to communicate with stake holders (No design).
  • Experienced with Jira, Confluence, ClickUp, Asana, and Linear.
  • Backlog & Roadmap management including challeging the business on priorities.
  • Deep interest and Quick study of domain knowledge.

Technical Product Management
